'''HoYoLAB Community Daily Check-In''' is a web event that rewards players for logging into [[miHoYo]]'s [[HoYoLAB|official forums]]. From the navigation bar on the left side of the page, clicking on Tools allows navigation to the Check-In page.

Players must click on the latest available reward in the Daily Check-In page, which will be highlighted, to claim it. The Reward History tab records the time and date when a reward was claimed. If the player also happens to be logged onto a character of the corresponding account, the reward will immediately arrive in their mailbox.

==Rules==
#You can check in once each day. Accumulate certain amounts of check-ins in a month to claim the corresponding rewards.
#Rewards and check-in progress are refreshed on the 1st of each month at 00:00. The previous month's check-ins will not be counted toward the next month.
#After logging into your miHoYo Account and checking in, all characters created under your account will receive the rewards via in-game mail that will be valid for 30 days. Make sure to claim the rewards in time. (Note: During server maintenance, there may be a slight delay in the delivery of rewards.)
#HoYoLAB reserves the right to final interpretation and explanation of the above rules to the extent permissible by law.
